core.game.callback
Class CallBackBuffer

java.lang.Object
  core.game.callback.CallBackBuffer

public class CallBackBuffer
extends java.lang.Object

this object defines a call buffer for use in the callback system

Author:
Mike

Field Summary
private  java.util.Vector<CallBackObject> callbackbuffer
          the callback object buffer
private  boolean callbackupdated
          indicates whether or not the buffer has been updated
 
Constructor Summary
